content.author: vitalikbuterin
content.content:
A simple L2 security and finalization roadmap

ethereum-magicians.org/t/a-s…

summary: Vitalik Buterin shared a link to a discussion on Ethereum Magicians about a straightforward roadmap for Layer 2 (L2) security and finalization. This roadmap likely outlines steps and strategies for improving the security and efficiency of L2 solutions on the Ethereum network. The tweet was posted on March 28 and can be accessed through the provided link.
